summary: Completely rebuilt Instagram section using exact pixel-perfect values from Figma CSS files. Created separate layouts for desktop, tablet, and mobile with precise dimensions, typography, spacing, and styling from Figma specifications. Desktop: logo 212x209px, text 330x92px (24px/46px), button 207x48px. Tablet: text 219x48px (16px/24px, weight 900), button 158x32px. Mobile: text 197.56x40px (13.47px/20px), button 119x24px. All values match Figma CSS exactly.
current_status: Instagram section completely rebuilt with pixel-perfect accuracy from Figma CSS files. All breakpoints (desktop, tablet, mobile) have exact dimensions, typography, spacing, and styling. Ready for browser testing.
